meanings.definition: A film or television show that takes the form of a documentary but presents fictional events.
meanings.sent1: I watched a hilarious mockumentary about aliens invading Earth.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching mockumentaries for their unique blend of reality and fiction.
meanings.sent3: The mockumentary about a talking dog had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The mockumentary on climate change shed light on the absurdity of human behavior.
meanings.sent5: The mockumentary on penguins made me laugh until I cried.

meanings.definition: The genre of filmmaking that combines elements of documentary and satire.
meanings.sent1: Mockumentaries often use humor to comment on real-life situations.
meanings.sent2: Fans of mockumentaries appreciate the clever way they blend fact and fiction.
meanings.sent3: The mockumentary on fashion had me chuckling at its witty take on the industry.
meanings.sent4: Watching the mockumentary on politics felt like a wake-up call wrapped in humor.
meanings.sent5: The mockumentary on superheroes was both entertaining and thought-provoking.
